def_cn: (指车轮、车灯或车门)靠近路边的;(在英国指)左边的
def_en: The nearside wheels, lights, or doors of a vehicle are those nearest the edge of the road when the vehicle is being driven on the correct side of the road. In Britain, the nearside is on the left.

def_cn: (车辆)靠路边的一侧，内侧，左边
def_en: The nearside of a vehicle is the side that is nearest the edge of the road when the vehicle is being driven on the correct side of the road.
